# cancel()

**Instance Method**

Stops the pattern player immediately and returns the specified error.

## Declaration

```swift
func cancel() throws
```

## Starting and Stopping Playback

- **start(atTime:)**: Starts playing the pattern at the specified time.
- **stop(atTime:)**: Stops playing the pattern at the specified time.
